## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                                      | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `controls` | `controls` | Show custom controls, this is not ready yet. Use native controls | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `poster`   | `poster`   | The poster image url                                             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `src`      | `src`      | The video URL.                                                   | `string`  | `undefined` |
